DataElement.preferredName: Female Patient Hormone Replacement Therapy Contraception Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded indicator to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation with regards to female patients on hormonal therapy agrees to contraception to prevent pregnancy as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Female Patient Hormone Replacement Therapy Contraception Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both. A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production._The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In zoology, denoting the sex that bears the young or the ovum.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Hormone Replacement Therapy Contraception Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production.:The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery.:The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Treatment with estrogens or estrogen/progesterone after menopause or ovariectomy to prevent pathological effects of decreased estrogen production.
The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If female patient is on hormo
ReferenceDocuments.description: If female patient is on hormone replacement therapy (HRT) and menopausal status is in doubt, has patient agreed to use one of the contraception methods outlined for women of child-bearing potential OR discontinue HRT to allow confirmation of post-menopausal status prior to study enrollment?
